tags.name: Dist-Tags
tags.description: Package version tagging and lifecycle management

tags.name: Access Control
tags.description: Package access permissions and collaborator management

tags.name: Static Assets
tags.description: Static file serving and web assets

get.description:
Check if the server is alive
```bash
$ npm ping
npm notice PING http://localhost:1337
npm notice PONG 13ms
```

Returns the username of the authenticated user
```bash
$ npm whoami
johnsmith
```

Returns profile object associated with auth token
```bash
$ npm profile
name: johnsmith
created: 2015-02-26T01:26:01.124Z
updated: 2023-01-10T21:55:32.118Z
```
Get dashboard configuration data for the VSR web interface
Get application data for the VSR web interface

List all authentication tokens for the authenticated user
```bash
$ npm token list
```

post.description:
Create a new authentication token
```bash
$ npm token create
```

delete.description:
Delete an authentication token
```bash
$ npm token revoke <token>
```

get.description:
Get all dist-tags for a package
```bash
$ npm dist-tag ls mypackage
```

put.description:
Set or update a dist-tag for a package version
```bash
$ npm dist-tag add mypackage@1.0.0 beta
```

403.description: Cannot modify dist-tags on proxied packages

delete.description:
Delete a dist-tag from a package
```bash
$ npm dist-tag rm mypackage beta
```

400.description: Cannot delete latest tag or invalid request

403.description: Cannot modify dist-tags on proxied packages

get.description: Get access control information for a package

post.description: Set access control information for a package

get.description: Get access control information for a scoped package

post.description: Set access control information for a scoped package

get.description: List all packages the authenticated user has access to

200.description: List of packages with access information

put.description: Grant access to a package for a specific user

delete.description: Revoke access to a package for a specific user

put.description: Grant access to a scoped package for a specific user

delete.description: Revoke access to a scoped package for a specific user

get.description:
Search for packages by text query
```bash
$ npm search react
```

post.description:
⚠️ **NOT IMPLEMENTED** - This endpoint is planned for future implementation.

Currently returns a placeholder response indicating the feature is not available.
  
For actual security auditing, use:
- `npm audit` with the official npm registry
- Third-party security scanning tools
- Socket.dev integration (planned for v1.x)

```bash
$ npm audit  # Will hit this endpoint but get "not implemented" response
```

501.description: Feature not implemented - security auditing is planned for future release

get.description: Redirect to current search endpoint for npm v1 compatibility
Redirect to current user endpoint for npm v1 compatibility
Redirect to current tokens endpoint for npm v1 compatibility

post.description: Redirect to current create token endpoint for npm v1 compatibility

put.description: Redirect to current update token endpoint for npm v1 compatibility

delete.description: Redirect to current delete token endpoint for npm v1 compatibility

post.description:
⚠️ **REDIRECTS TO /-/npm/audit** - This endpoint redirects to the main audit endpoint with a 308 status.

The main audit endpoint is currently not implemented and returns a "not implemented" response.

308.description: Permanent redirect to /-/npm/audit (which returns 501 Not Implemented)

post.description:
⚠️ **REDIRECTS TO /-/npm/audit** - This endpoint redirects to the main audit endpoint with a 308 status.

The main audit endpoint is currently not implemented and returns a "not implemented" response.

308.description: Permanent redirect to /-/npm/audit (which returns 501 Not Implemented)

get.description: Download scoped package tarball from upstream registry

404.description: Scoped package tarball not found in upstream registry

get.summary: Get upstream scoped package version manifest
get.description: Retrieve specific version manifest for scoped package from upstream registry

200.description: Scoped package version manifest retrieved successfully

404.description: Scoped package version not found in upstream registry

404.description: Package tarball not found in upstream registry

404.description: URL-encoded scoped package not found in upstream registry

get.description: Handles both /upstream/@scope/package and /upstream/package/version patterns

200.description: Package manifest or version data retrieved successfully

404.description: Package not found in upstream registry

get.description: Retrieve package manifest from upstream registry (e.g., npm, jsr)

404.description: Package not found in upstream registry

put.description:
Publish a new version of a package
```bash
$ npm publish
```

get.description:
Get the full package manifest (packument) for a package
```bash
$ npm view lodash
```
Download the tarball for a specific version of a package

Get the manifest for a specific version of a package
```bash
$ npm view lodash@4.17.21
```
